entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:47 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 12:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

Temperature: -33.7°C

Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 68 %

Dewpoint: -37.6°C
